transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Executive: Hi sir, main Vidushi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se bataiye.

Customer: Sir mere do teen din pehle baat hui thi koi help ke liye mera number hoga koi.

Executive: Kisse baat hui thi?

Customer: Number bolta tha.

Executive: Kya naam tha?
Customer: Ek minute ruko, ek minute ruko. Number tha unka

Customer: Ye tha 78388

Executive: 78388

Customer: Nahi nahi nahi 783

Executive: Achcha 78388

Customer: Haan ji haan ji 60434

Executive: Achcha ji sir bataiye.

Customer: Ye number kiska hai mam apne customer ka hai ki kya hai?
Executive: Sir ye mera hi hai, ye mera hi number hai.

Customer: To mam maine aapko ek din call kiya tha aapne koi reply nahi kiya mam kam se kam 15 din ho gaye iske baad fir call kiya maine aapko update karana hai.
Executive: Sir ek minute suniye to aap mujhe pehle ye to bataiye aapki company ka naam kya hai?

Customer: Shiv Enterprises ke naam se baat Shiv Enterprises.
Executive: Achcha sir, sir pata hai ye number na aapka Shiv Enterprises mein registered nahi hai dusre wali id karke aa raha hai to main isliye confuse ho gayi thi. Maine ye aapko call kiya tha ye pata hai kis naam se aa raha hai ye sirf blank aa raha hai aapki id aa rahi hai. Bataiye sir kya query hai sorry agar reply na diya ho main chutti pe hongi shayad isliye reply nahi kiya hoga.

Customer: Ye catalog ke bare mein bola tha maine kaha mam catalog update karo matlab inquiry nahi aa rahi rotavator meri.
Executive: Catalog update kiya catalog update kiya hai maine bhi. Sir aap ye bataiye abhi even hai to main aapko na visual meeting ke liye link bhej deti hu aap join kar lo link to end jitne bhi sari query hai wo discuss kar lete hain.

Customer: Sir kuch nahi karna hai update karna hai isme se hero hatani hai hero ki inquiry nahi aati mere ko aapko bola dekho ek bar dal ke rakha hai isme.
Executive: Sir mere ko batao to maine kiya hai update sir.

Customer: Kahan update kiya mam batao.
Executive: Sir main main khol ke bata deti hu ek minute maine proper kaam kiya hai aapki profile pe mujhe yaad hai acche se sir.

Customer: Mam koi update nahi hua main isko IndiaMART chalaata hu.
Executive: Sir ho sakta hai sir suniye ho sakta hai aapke paas show na kar raha ho koi technical issue ho sakta hai aap ye to mat boliye na ki aapne nahi kiya sir maine kiya hai mujhe pata hai acche se sir wo update nahi hua hoga wo alag baat hai sir.

Customer: Dekho maine ye baat batao.
Executive: Sir maine ye listing ki hai price kya hai likha hua hai.

Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Ye jo aapka rota rotavator part karke aapka product hai na nut bolt all size.

Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye product maine list kiya hai aapka primary category mein kyuki isme koi category map nahi thi to maine isko primary category mein map kiya tha jisse aapke paas relevant buylead aaye relevant kya hai.

Customer: Ye to ye to mam maine dala hai ab ye to deactivate mein tha deactivate wala maine isko nikala deactivate mein do product aur pade hai mere bhi.
Executive: Sir ye new post likh ke aa raha hai product yahan pe lekin.

Customer: Kya aa raha hai?
Executive: Aapke paas new post mein aa raha hai matlab jaise abhi update hua hai.

Customer: Aap to bolte raho ye maine kal kal kiya tha pata nahi parso update kiya tha isko deactivate mein pada tha deactivate se maine nikala isko.
Executive: Aur hero wala aap jo bol rahe ho na sir wo hata diya gaya hai aapki profile se aap ek bar dekho dhyan se aapka jo hero wala product hai wo hai hi nahi yahan pe ek ye aa raha hai bas tiler karke aa raha hai tiler blades karke.

Customer: Sir maine aapko bola tha inquiry nahi aati.
Executive: Dekho hero wala koi product nahi hai hero ki jagah pata hai kya naam aa raha hai ye aa raha hai aapka C H U C K N U T.

Customer: Bas nut ke naam se aa raha hai.

Customer: Jo mere pe inquiry lead aati hai na lead haan un lead pe har ek hero ke liye bola tha hero ke liye nahi aati mere paas ab dekho a rahi hai to disro.
Executive: Sir meri baat suno aapke paas na dekho har tarah ki leads aayengi aapne na buylead last kab consume ki hai sir?

Customer: Aapne buylead kab ki nahi nahi sir matter karta hai buylead consume karna bhi aapne aaj ek buylead consume ki hai aur 16 tarikh ko aapne do buylead consume ki thi hai na to isme pata hai kya hai abhi aapka ticket bhi open tha maine uske regarding bhi aapko call karke yahi bola tha ki aapka ticket bhi open hai main isko bhi close karaati hu theek hai aur aapne 9696 se call kiya hai sir abhi

Customer: Dusre wale call kar rahi hu aapke ye number yahan pe registered nahi aa raha hai ticket close karna hai mere ko aapne ticket open kara diya.
Executive: Ticket kya mam jab aap sunte nahi ho to kya kare fir payment karte hai mam ko free to koi inquiry nahi aati.
Executive: Sir main maine kab nahi suna sir ye to batao aap aapki call abhi aayi hai maine turant pick kari hai maine call nahi hai kya aap aapne sath nahi mam ek minute ruko shukrawar ya shaniwar ko main aapse baat hui aapne kya bolna mam aap aise karna dhai teen baje baad call kar lena chalo main kar lunga theek hai main aapne call ki ho ek bhi.
Executive: Sir ek baat batao saturday sunday chutti rehti hai office band rehta hai kaise call karte hain.

Customer: baat se baat nahi aapne khud bola tha nahi nahi meri baat suno shukrawar ya shaniwar ko baat hui thi.
Executive: Sir suniye to sir saturday sunday chutti thi aur main friday off thi kyuki meri tabiyat kharab thi sir meri tabiyat kharab thi jab main apne aap ko nahi sambhal pa rahi thi sir tab aapko call kiya aapne mujhe maine call uthaya aapne mujhse jo pucha maine aapko wo cheeze bhi batai.

Customer: Nahi aap aapne ye bola tha ki nahi bola tha aap batao mam aapne bola tha ki nahi bola tha ki mam main aapko dhai teen baje ke baad call karunga theek hai mam dhai teen baje call kar lena aapne mujhse kya pucha tha sir aapne mujhse na
Executive: aapne mujhse na aise India ka pucha tha maine wahi aapko bataya tha aur sir maine aapko ye bhi bataya tha ki sir meri tabiyat kharab hai main isliye chutti pe hu saturday sunday sir meri chutti rehti hai office ki aaj aapne abhi call kiya maine turant call utha li aap batao meri galti se kahan pe hai.

Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi mam isko update karana hai mujhe se bana do theek hai request.
Executive: Sir suniye suniye main na aapko dusre number pe call kar rahi hu ek bar wahan se please pick kar lo sir mere ko ticket bhi close karna padega abhi sir.

Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan main aapko call kar rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update catalog.

- Customer not receiving inquiries.

- Customer says hero product is missing.



Resolution:

- Executive updated catalog, technical issue may exist.

- Executive explained primary category mapping.

- Executive offered visual meeting to discuss queries.

- Executive explained about buylead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on another number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, buyleads, technical issue, hero product
